Stereo Networks | Full Stack Engineer (Node, React, GraphQL), Network Systems Engineer (Layer 3) | Toronto, Canada | (https://stereonetworks.com) | ONSITE / REMOTE (Greater Toronto Area only) | FULL TIME

-We are a team of passionate engineers, designers, and entrepreneurs. -We are looking to hire 2 people immediately.

Currently, we are building an Internet aggregation product and we are looking for a Full Stack Engineer and a Network System Engineer.

Full Stack Engineer: -Tech stack: Node, React, GraphQL (AppSync), AWS

Network Systems Engineer: -Expertise with networking principles and protocols (BGP/Layer 3) -Knowledge and experience using Linux for package installation/maintenance and deploying solutions that leverage Containerization/Virtualization.

For both roles, you will have the option of working from home (GTA only) or our office, whatever suits you best.

You can reach out to me directly at mailto:cameron@stereonetworks.com
